thread.title: Voices: Be Wary of Clients Using MLPs for Income—Michael Carlin
thread.title_full: Voices: Be Wary of Clients Using MLPs for Income—Michael Carlin - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Voices: Be Wary of Clients Using MLPs for Income—Michael Carlin
text:
Michael Carlin is principal of Wealth Management LLC in Scottsdale, Ariz. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community.
It’s a strange time for our clients who are retirees. As they seek out meaningful income streams in this low-interest-rate environment, we see them investing in ways they would never have considered just a few years ago.
...
